news.title: Test News Item
news.body: Some *beautiful* body text, available in 7 strong flavours.

news.title: TribesLauncher Alpha Testing
news.body:
The TribesLauncher client has hit alpha! There's still a _lot_ of development work to go, but it is now able to perform the basic functionality of updating and injecting TAMods.

\- mcoot
